utc_offset1_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = [[Provinces of Sweden|Province]] | blank_info_sec1 = [[Scania]] | blank1_name_sec1 = [[Kommunkod|Municipal code]] | blank1_info_sec1 = 1264 | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code_type = | area_code = | iso_code = [[ISO 3166-2:SE|SE<!--??-->]] | website = [http://www.skurup.se www.skurup.se]<!-- {{URL|example.com}} --> | footnotes = }} '''Skurup Municipality''' (''Skurups kommun'') is a [[Municipalities of Sweden|municipality]] in [[Skåne County]] in southern [[Sweden]]. Its seat is located in the town [[Skurup]]. It is considered part of [[Greater Malmö]] by [[Statistics Sweden]]. The present municipality was formed in 1971 when the market town (''[[köping]]'') of ''Skurup'' was merged with ''Rydsgård'' and ''Vemmenhög''. ==Localities== There are 4 [[Urban areas in Sweden|urban area]]s (also called a Tätort or locality) in Skurup Municipality. In the table they are listed according to the size of the population as of December 31, 2005. The municipal seat is in bold characters. {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Locality !! Population |- | 1 || '''[[Skurup]]''' || 6,978 |- | 2 || [[Rydsgård]] || 1,301 |- | 3 || [[Skivarp]] || 1,252 |- | 4 || [[Abbekås]] || 708 |} == Places of interest == * [[Svaneholm Castle]] ==Twin cities== * [[Maszlow]], [[Poland]] * [[Amt Franzburg-Richtenberg]], [[Germany]] ==References== *[http://www.scb.se Statistics Sweden] {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.skurup.se/ Skurup] - Official site *[http://www.ngw.nl/int/zwe/s/images/skurup.jpg Coat of arms] {{Skåne County}} {{Localities in Skurup Municipality}} {{coord|55|29|N|13|30|E|region:SE_type:adm2nd|display=title}} [[Category:Municipalities of Sweden]] [[Category:Municipalities of Skåne County]]
